response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our flagship product, which I believe will significantly enhance your business operations and contribute to your success. Given its high value and potential impact on your endeavors, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $14,500. This special offer is tailored to recognize your discerning taste and commitment to excellence. I am confident that this investment will pay dividends in terms of efficiency, productivity, and overall business growth. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this exceptional opportunity.", "product_price": 14500}
